feature.label: Webclipse Navigation & Research Aides
feature.description:
The Webclipse Navigation & Research Aides feature adds power-ups to your Eclipse workbench:
Project Explorer+ is a powerful replacement to the Project / Package Explorers with filtering, search, and advanced content display.
The Breadcrumb toolbar aids contextual navigation, allowing you to easily access resources relative to resources currently being edited.
The Minimap allows you to easily navigate through large source files using a modern visual outline of your code.
The DevSearch feature allows you to query GitHub, Stack Overflow and Eclipse Help directly in your IDE.
